001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.builders;
002
003import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.CreateIDPRequest;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.DeleteIDPRequest;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetActiveIDPRequest;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.control.SetIDPSegmentRequest;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.IDPSegmentRequest;
009import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.IDPSettingsRequest;
010import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus.ProfileStatusRequest;
011import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSegmentResponse;
012import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.IDPSettingsResponse;
013import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.ProfileStatusResponse;
014
015import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
016
017import java.util.ArrayList;
018import java.util.Comparator;
019import java.util.List;
020import java.util.Optional;
021
022/**
023 * IDPManager provides a loose abstraction over processing insulin delivery profile (IDP) response
024 * manages, generating the requests necessary to get a full state of the profiles on the pump, and
025 * generating request messages in the correct format for making mutations on pump profiles.
026 */
027public class IDPManager {
028    public static class Profile {
029        private IDPSettingsResponse idpSettingsResponse;
030        private List<IDPSegmentResponse> segments = new ArrayList<>();
031        public Profile(IDPSettingsResponse idpSettingsResponse) {
032            this.idpSettingsResponse = idpSettingsResponse;
033        }
034
035        public boolean isComplete() {
036            return segments.size() == idpSettingsResponse.getNumberOfProfileSegments();
037        }
038
039        public IDPSettingsResponse getIdpSettingsResponse() {
040            return idpSettingsResponse;
041        }
042
043        public int getIdpId() {
044            return idpSettingsResponse.getIdpId();
045        }
046
047        public List<IDPSegmentResponse> getSegments() {
048            Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
049            return segments;
050        }
051
052        public Message deleteProfileMessage() {
053            return new DeleteIDPRequest(getIdpId());
054        }
055
056        public Message duplicateProfileMessage(String newProfileName) {
057            return new CreateIDPRequest(newProfileName, getIdpId());
058        }
059
060        public Message setActiveProfileMessage() {
061            return new SetActiveIDPRequest(getIdpId());
062        }
063
064        public Message deleteSegmentMessage(IDPSegmentResponse segment) {
065            Validate.isTrue(segment.getIdpId() == getIdpId());
066            Validate.isTrue(segment.getSegmentIndex() != 0, "Deleting the 0th segment index is not supported");
067            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, segment.getSegmentIndex(),
068                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.DELETE_SEGMENT_ID,
069                    segment.getProfileStartTime(), segment.getProfileBasalRate(), segment.getProfileCarbRatio(), segment.getProfileTargetBG(), segment.getProfileISF(),
070                    segment.getIdpStatusId());
071        }
072
073        public Message modifySegmentMessage(IDPSegmentResponse segment) {
074            Validate.isTrue(segment.getIdpId() == getIdpId());
075            int statusId = 0;
076            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, segment.getSegmentIndex(),
077                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.MODIFY_SEGMENT_ID,
078                    segment.getProfileStartTime(), segment.getProfileBasalRate(), segment.getProfileCarbRatio(), segment.getProfileTargetBG(), segment.getProfileISF(),
079                    IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.toBitmask( // 31
080                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.BASAL_RATE,
081                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CARB_RATIO,
082                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.TARGET_BG,
083                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CORRECTION_FACTOR,
084                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.START_TIME));
085        }
086
087        public Message createSegmentMessage(int profileStartTime, int profileBasalRate, long profileCarbRatio, int profileTargetBG, int profileISF) {
088            return new SetIDPSegmentRequest(getIdpId(), 0 /* ??? */, 0,
089                    SetIDPSegmentRequest.IDPSegmentOperation.CREATE_SEGMENT,
090                    profileStartTime, profileBasalRate, profileCarbRatio, profileTargetBG, profileISF,
091                    IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.toBitmask( // 31
092                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.BASAL_RATE,
093                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CARB_RATIO,
094                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.TARGET_BG,
095                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.CORRECTION_FACTOR,
096                            IDPSegmentResponse.IDPSegmentStatus.START_TIME));
097        }
098
099        private void processMessage(Message message) {
100            if (message instanceof IDPSegmentResponse) {
101                int idpId = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getIdpId();
102                Validate.isTrue(idpId == getIdpId());
103
104                int segmentIndex = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getSegmentIndex();
105                segments.removeIf(s -> segmentIndex == s.getSegmentIndex());
106                segments.add((IDPSegmentResponse) message);
107                segments.sort(Comparator.comparingInt(IDPSegmentResponse::getSegmentIndex));
108            } else if (message instanceof IDPSettingsResponse) {
109                int idpId = ((IDPSettingsResponse) message).getIdpId();
110                Validate.isTrue(idpId == getIdpId());
111
112                idpSettingsResponse = (IDPSettingsResponse) message;
113            }
114        }
115
116    }
117
118    private final List<Profile> profiles = new ArrayList<>();
119    private ProfileStatusResponse profileStatusResponse;
120
121    public IDPManager() {}
122    public IDPManager(ProfileStatusResponse profileStatusResponse) {
123        this.profileStatusResponse = profileStatusResponse;
124    }
125
126    public List<Message> nextMessages() {
127        List<Message> messages = new ArrayList<>();
128
129        if (profileStatusResponse == null) {
130            messages.add(new ProfileStatusRequest());
131            return messages;
132        }
133
134        profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().forEach(idpSlotId -> {
135           Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpSlotId).findFirst();
136
137           if (profile.isEmpty()) {
138               messages.add(new IDPSettingsRequest(idpSlotId));
139           } else {
140               int segmentCount = profile.get().getIdpSettingsResponse().getNumberOfProfileSegments();
141               if (!profile.get().isComplete()) {
142                   for (int i=0; i<segmentCount; i++) {
143                       int finalI = i;
144                       if (profile.get().segments.stream().noneMatch(s -> s.getSegmentIndex() == finalI)) {
145                           messages.add(new IDPSegmentRequest(idpSlotId, i));
146                       }
147                   }
148               }
149           }
150
151        });
152
153        return messages;
154    }
155
156    public IDPManager processMessage(Message message) {
157        if (message instanceof ProfileStatusResponse) {
158            profileStatusResponse = (ProfileStatusResponse) message;
159            profiles.removeIf(p -> !profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().contains(p.getIdpId()));
160        } else if (message instanceof IDPSettingsResponse) {
161            int idpId = ((IDPSettingsResponse) message).getIdpId();
162            Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
163            if (profile.isPresent()) {
164                profile.get().processMessage(message);
165            } else {
166                profiles.add(new Profile((IDPSettingsResponse) message));
167            }
168            profiles.sort((a,b) -> profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().indexOf(a.getIdpId()) - profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().indexOf(b.getIdpId()));
169        } else if (message instanceof IDPSegmentResponse) {
170            int idpId = ((IDPSegmentResponse) message).getIdpId();
171            Optional<Profile> profile = profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
172            if (profile.isPresent()) {
173                profile.get().processMessage(message);
174            }
175        }
176
177        return this;
178    }
179
180    public static boolean isIDPManagerResponse(Message message) {
181        return (message instanceof ProfileStatusResponse) || (message instanceof IDPSettingsResponse) || (message instanceof IDPSegmentResponse);
182    }
183
184    public boolean isComplete() {
185        return profileStatusResponse != null && profiles.size() == profileStatusResponse.getNumberOfProfiles() && profiles.stream().allMatch(Profile::isComplete);
186    }
187
188    public List<Profile> getProfiles() {
189        Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
190        return profiles;
191    }
192
193    public Profile getActiveProfile() {
194        Validate.isTrue(isComplete());
195        int activeSlot = profileStatusResponse.getActiveIdpSlotId();
196        int activeIdpId = profileStatusResponse.getIdpSlotIds().get(activeSlot);
197        return getProfileWithIdpId(activeIdpId).orElseThrow();
198    }
199
200    public Optional<Profile> getProfileWithIdpId(int idpId) {
201        return profiles.stream().filter(p -> p.getIdpId() == idpId).findFirst();
202    }
203
204    public void clear() {
205        profiles.clear();
206        profileStatusResponse = null;
207    }
208
209    public Message createNewProfileMessage(String profileName, int firstSegmentProfileCarbRatio, int firstSegmentProfileBasalRate, int firstSegmentProfileTargetBG, int firstSegmentProfileISF, int profileInsulinDuration, int profileCarbEntry) {
210        return new CreateIDPRequest(profileName, firstSegmentProfileCarbRatio, firstSegmentProfileBasalRate, firstSegmentProfileTargetBG, firstSegmentProfileISF, profileInsulinDuration, profileCarbEntry);
211    }
212
213}
